name: XenoRelics - White Rider No1
description:
Grab one of these 9 White RiderNo2 limited collectibles before I reveal the secret project.

When I started this piece in my mind there was a vision of a shapeshifter entity that emerges from a dark living matter. It is from a distant dark place that isn`t negative nor positive… It's an exciting dynamic organic  form that has no concrete shape and any moment it will morph into something familiar...It is you who can get meaning to it!

The White RiderNo1 is a digital version of the original Oil painting. The Xenorelics series are a part of my lifelong Art program that I have learned from my master Sandor Molnar a brilliant mind who invented and created a new approach to spiritual growth for artists, called Painter Yoga. It's a unique implementation of ancient Occult teachings into the modern life of an artist.

Get your Xenorelics White RiderNo1 limited edition collectible NOW!
